message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is tailored to enhance your daily life. This unique item has been meticulously designed to meet your specific needs and expectations. Given its high-quality craftsmanship and exclusive features, I believe it's worth more than just $100. However, I am open to discussing a fair price that would be beneficial for both of us. Considering its value, I suggest an offer of $150. Please let me know if this aligns with your expectations or if you'd like to propose a different amount. Looking forward to your response!
